titles.title: God's Not Dead, He Is Alive

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God's not dead, He is alive.
God's not dead, He is alive.
God's not dead, He is alive.
I feel Him in my hands, I feel Him in my feet,
I feel Him in my heart, I feel Him in my soul,
I feel Him all over me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dios no ha muerto, viviendo esta. (3x)
Lo siento en mis manos, lo siento en mis pies,
Lo siento en mi alma, lo siento en mi ser,
Lo siento sobre mi.
